```{r}
#test for association between native county status and EPA_region: chi-squared
library(MASS)
EPA_reservation_tbl <- table(reservation_count_full$county_type, reservation_count_full$EPA_region)
chisq.test(EPA_reservation_tbl) #large test statistic provides evidence that native county status is not independent of EPA region

in_tbls <- list(census_avgmon_full, 
                cluster_avgmon_full,
                SHS_avgmon_full,
                reservation_avgmon_full)

#rural/urban list for all classifications
out_tbls <- list(length(in_tbls))
xtbls <- list()
for (i in 1:length(in_tbls)){
  out_tbls[[i]] <- table(in_tbls[[i]]$county_type,
                         in_tbls[[i]]$land_use)
  xtbls[[i]] <- xtable(out_tbls[[i]])
}
xtbls

#EPA region for all classifications
out_EPA_tbls <- list(length(in_tbls))
EPA_xtbls <- list()
for (i in 1:length(in_tbls)){
  out_EPA_tbls[[i]] <- table(in_tbls[[i]]$county_type,
                         in_tbls[[i]]$EPA_region)
  EPA_xtbls[[i]] <- xtable(out_EPA_tbls[[i]])
}
EPA_xtbls
```
